column8:
$ put
*check(!p ANY capacity>max items, max, there's too much item in the thing)
transferTo(!p ANY capacity)
*add(!p ANY capacity>max items, 1)
*sub(!p ANY capacity>max items, 1)
column9:
$ throw
transferTo(!p ANY capacity)
%
transferTo(! tile)
*sub(! parent>max items, 1)
column10:
$ pick up
check(!p ANY capacity>max items, max, y'en a trop pour le premier truc)
transferTo(!p ANY capacity)
add(!p ANY capacity>max items, 1)
%
check(! left hand>max items, max, y'en a trop pour left hand)
transferTo(! left hand)
add(! left hand>max items, 1)
